Index1.Slogan: Real estate sale in the heart of the Mayan culture.
Index1.Descripcion: A new concept that redefines the way of living in Yucatán with a 9-hole illuminated golf course and a sports club that meets the highest requirements.

Amenidades.DescAmeni: Welcome, here you will find the most luxurious facilities to enjoy your free time and relax in an exceptional environment.

Lema.LemaText: Royal County San José Chakan, a unique and exclusive community, nourished by a deep ecological commitment and the desire to live sustainably and to the fullest.

Modals.SubTitMod: Enter the password provided to you.
Modals.NoContraMod: I still don't have a password

Inmobiliarias.MasterSubC: Get in touch to purchase one of our available lots or to resolve your questions.
Inmobiliarias.DescComisi: The commission is paid upon the signing of the purchase agreement once the client has made the 30% down payment. Commission payment is via bank transfer or check to the account, in the national currency.
Inmobiliarias.Pas1Comisi: Confirmation and proof of down payment are required.
Inmobiliarias.Pas3Comisi: The commission is based on the base price, excluding any additional fees.
Inmobiliarias.Pas4Comisi: The commission is paid to the agency that receives the reservation and down payment.
Inmobiliarias.Pas5Comisi: The person requesting commission payment must be the owner of the real estate agency.
Inmobiliarias.Pas6Comisi: Commission payment request is made via email, the email must come from the owner's email address.
Inmobiliarias.Pas7Comisi: If the owner cannot personally collect the payment, the email must mention who will collect it, and this person must present their ID for identification.
Inmobiliarias.Pas8Comisi: The person collecting the commission must bring the commission payment format printed.
Inmobiliarias.Pas9Comisi: The average time for commission release is 15 to 30 days maximum.
Inmobiliarias.Pas10Comisi: According to NOM 247, commission may be requested after the 5-day period given to the client to request their down payment refund.
Inmobiliarias.Pas11Comisi: If there is any delay in commission release, the owner will be notified via message or email.

AcercaDe.DescAcer: It is part of one of the most exclusive communities; fusing luxury and colonial architecture, as well as a deep ecological, sustainable sense. Just 20 minutes from Mérida and 10 minutes from Chixchulub Puerto beach. Within the residential quadrant with the highest capital gains. Residences with lots from 1,000 to 2,000 meters of land and 355 meters of construction.

BieyRela.DescBieRel: A space created especially for you, stop, breathe and relax at the Eternal Beauty spa clinic. Let us pamper you, surrender to joy, pure bliss and sensory delight. Enjoy a kingdom of beauty with complete confidence and serenity.
